description.value:
Others Attempting to cheat by Sleight of Hand or other such skills involving trade deals and the like have -30 penalty when this machine is used to process the relevent data.

Requirements

Can be Temperamental. Doesn't need to be on the character's person, Merely needs to be able to be accessed readily (such as it being housed on the Character's vessel).

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
